ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have one thing to say.  You re a dumbass.  If you can t get to level 9 from 8 in 20 hours you re a friggin moron.  My magician got from level 1-25 in
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
>To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Enchanters and Research (Bersker Str)
>Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 20:56:53 -0400
>
>From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>
>
> > Not everybody wants to spend 20 years(REAL LIFE) on a game to advance
>to lvl 30.High lvls are there to be concquered, not to ber stared and
>drooled at (what lvl were you eventually in that MUD?And why arent you
>still playing it?).Dont forget that there will be expansion which will
>increase lvl limit..Anyways if you say that lvling is so easy, then may I
>ask what lvl are you?And I dont get what Diablo hacking has to do whith
>high lvls?You say that thoseDiablo cheats are the fastest lvlers is EQ?Man,
>yer talking BS, most of those Diablo cheats played their chars only to lvl
>20 and then started cheating.And the fact that 6 lvl 20 chars killed ONE
>lvl high MOB is normal,why in hell we have parties.Anyways the necromances
>arent that great, they may well do agaisnt few high lvl creatures, but when
>necro gets attacked by swarm of low lvl creatures, hes fucked up.And the
>fact that you wont get much exp or loot from killing those SGs.
> As You can see I'm not the only one who has issues with Verant's style
>of "Game Balance" That hack it down make em weaker and weaker type
>mentality. Verant is so hypocritical in doing this that's it's
>insulting. Why shouldn't we be upset, why shouldn't we expect more,
>fight for more, or at least what they claimed they would provide?
> As for sitting around on 7th level for six months reminds me of our
>neighbors young boy who happens to have Down Syndrome.. No knocking the
>kid he has a big heart, but he also has been trying to learn
>multiplication for the last 3 years!. Who the hell wants to stay on one
>cheesy level for more than 20hrs? think about it 20hrs is playing every
>night four 4 hours? now if you don't have a family or a life of some
>sort you may have the time to just vegge out on 8th or ninth level for a
>year. I however do not, I want to eventualy see everything EQ has to
>offer I would like to play all of the classes to 50th level. Think about
>it at the "Todd"(the kid next door)like pace your talking about
>advancing it would take you 7 YEARS! of continuous play to attain 50th
>level, with the time involved doing that you could have attained a
>Master's Degree. Not to mention a staggering 100 Years to play all of
>the classes to 50th. Come on people who wants to sit in front of their
>PC and constantly be struggling and never having enough? Not me, not me.
>Besides if you want to be weak and modest don't play to gain exp. play
>to role play. Heck or Play some good O'l D&D around the Dinner table
>with friends. But don't complain about how easy it is to have fun and
>advance.
>
>Vastad,
>
>PS,
>I'll leave it at that. I apologize & I am aware that this is not the
>proper place for this, I just saw the comment and it made me go there.
>Sorry but that's just how I feel & I KNOW I'm not alone... EQ is a big
>game with many servers, mabey have different types of servers. Like a
>"Todd" server for those people that have the next 20 years free to play.
>And a fun server with quicker advancement better skills and less
>"cheased" down spells. I think we can all get along.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Looking to expand your world?
>http://www.onelist.com
>ONElist has nearly 150,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
> Please keep the emails on topic.

I have one thing to say. You're a dumbass. If you can't get to level 9
from 8 in 20 hours you're a friggin moron. My magician got from level 1-25
in exactly 10 days of playing
